## LineItemPriceMode enum

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum LineItemPriceMode 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ExternalPrice | <code>&quot;ExternalPrice&quot;</code> | The line item price was set externally. Cart discounts can apply to line items with this price mode. All update actions that change the quantity of a line item with this price mode require the externalPrice field to be given. |
|  ExternalTotal | <code>&quot;ExternalTotal&quot;</code> | The line item price with the total was set externally. |
|  Platform | <code>&quot;Platform&quot;</code> | The price is selected form the product variant. This is the default mode. |
